name: Alice Jones
description: Known for her love of vintage cars and energetic explanations, Dr. Gearhead's advice might be more entertaining than mechanically sound.

name: Bob Smith
description: A friendly mechanic with a wealth of experience fixing lawnmowers and a talent for storytelling. Rusty's knowledge might not translate perfectly to modern car repair.

name: Charlie Lee
description: Professor Torque has a large online following thanks to his confident car repair tutorials. However, the accuracy of his advice can be questionable.

name: Thomas Alfred
description: IA Wrench can access and process a vast amount of car repair information, but lacks the real-world experience to diagnose or fix problems itself.

name: Ethan Miller
description: Sir Charles loves to talk cars and boasts impressive credentials, but his expertise might be more about storytelling than actual mechanical knowledge.
